_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate account settings copy

page.title: Page title for account settings. Ex: 'My Account', 'Settings', 'Profile Settings'

sections.profile: Section heading for profile information (name, avatar). Ex: 'Profile', 'Personal Information'
sections.preferences: Section heading for user preferences (language, timezone, theme). Ex: 'Preferences', 'Your Preferences'

fields.fullName: Label for full name input. Ex: 'Full Name', 'Your Name'
fields.language: Label for language selector. Ex: 'Language', 'Preferred Language'
fields.timezone: Label for timezone selector. Ex: 'Timezone', 'Your Timezone'
fields.theme: Label for theme toggle (light/dark). Ex: 'Theme', 'Color Mode'

actions.save: Button to save changes. Ex: 'Save Changes', 'Update Profile'
actions.saved: Success message after save. Ex: 'Changes saved successfully', 'Profile updated!'
